Action.author: jyellick
Action.body: ~Pratika can you confirm that this is a duplciate of FAB-8634 as indicated by ~zhaochy ?

Action.author: pratika
Action.body: It is same as your issue Zhao Chaoyi . Actually I am able to invoke using Go chaincode but but not with Node chaincode.

Action.author: elli-androulaki
Action.body: Hi, is this fixed already? Also, should this be classified as "bug"?

Action.author: elli-androulaki
Action.body: I am removing fabric-crypto from relevant components, as I think it only relates to fabric-peer.

Action.author: davidkel
Action.body: ~elli-androulaki I don't believe there is anything to fix as the issue appears to be chaincode calling chaincode which calls chaincode. This is not the situation in your case but looks like an error in your code. You need to `await` on the invokeChaincode call as it will return a promise.Â

Action.author: davidkel
Action.body: I don't believe there is an issue here and no further response from reporter
